text: Nellyville is an American reality television series which airs on BET. The series debuted on November 25, 2014, and chronicles the life of American rapper Nelly and his family. ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (2014-15)=== ===Season 2 (2015)=== ==References== Category:2010s American reality television series Category:2014 American television series debuts Category:2015 American television series endings Category:African-American reality television series Category:BET original programming
title: Nellyville (TV series)
